```{r setup}
library(neuralNetworks)

data.name.vec <- c(
  "spam",
  "SAheart",
  "zip.train",
  "prostate",
  "ozone")
data.list <- list()
library(ElemStatLearn)
for(data.name in data.name.vec){
  data(list=data.name, package = "ElemStatLearn")
  data.list[[data.name]] <- get(data.name)
}
str(data.list)
```
